title: Is it rude to fart as a woman? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a woman, or should I say, as a human it's not rude to fart. I won't go into the medical or scientific aspect of farting, but rather the ethics. Farts will evolve sometimes in the most awkward of times and places, whether it's at work or at home. Regardless of the timing it needs to be released, and as a woman, look for in ingenious ways to disguise them.

The reality is everyone farts and farts by and large are noisy and smelly. Farting is same as any other activity of human being, such as we do them routinely. Farting per se is not rude. But the way you fart is rude at times.The fart can be rude in some places.In front of some people at certain times.So, as long as you keep the above things in mind, it is not rude to fart. Happy farting!
